channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large box dumped on Road, 28th February
item.description:
Large suspicious looking locked box has been dumped on the road tied to the nearest lamp post opposite 138 College Road SE19 1XH

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter dumped, 28th February
item.description:
Newly moved In and rubbish is tipped everywhere in shared garden! I have a severely autistic child who loves to be outdoors but this isn’t a safe environment for my child at all! Can you please help in getting this removed asap. Thank you in advance. 18/19 Bertrand Way SE28 8LL

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bertrand Way, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2nd sprawling tent camp, 28th February
item.description:
Another tent. 3 recently, which remain for long periods of time. Suitcases, bedding in bushes, bicycle, old chair.... Dirty tissues, cardboard, clothes strewn around the park. Health hazard. Unsafe, unsanitary and unpleasant.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Palatine Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked on double yellows on Seal Street, 28th February
item.description:
Car constantly parks on double yellows displaying a disabled badge.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Seal Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Whole section of road needs attention

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Highgate Road, Dartmouth Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light on corner of Rusholme Grove and Dulwich Wood Avenue on 24/7., 28th February
item.description:
This is disorienting for the birds which means that the dawn chorus starts at 2.30am disrupting their natural behaviour and very possibly having a damaging environmental impact in general. It is also a waste of electricity. Please could something be done about this as this has been going on for at least 6 months?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dulwich Wood Avenue, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 28th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highgate Road, Dartmouth Park, Greater London

item.title: Bikes constantly blocking pavement and driveways, 28th February
item.description:
These bikes are constantly left blocking the pavements, I've reported to Voi and Lime several times and they don't do anything. The pavement is completely blocked as well as not being able to remove or park cars in the bays.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Long Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tent camp and associated rubbish, 28th February
item.description:
Unsanitary, unsafe, unpleasant. Has been here at least 4 weeks. Butterfield Green is turning into a campsite. Many locals (nursery, dog walkers, school children) are put off using the park.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Allen Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: GL60 WYF - Abandoned. No MOT. No insurance. No SORN., 28th February
item.description:
Vehicle number GL60 - a ford - has no MOT. No insurance and no Stsutory Off Road Notice. Has not been moved for years. Also continual flytipping behind this vehicle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Alice Street, Walworth, Greater London

item.title: Abandoned trolleys, 28th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salutation Road, Greenwich

item.title: Dog fouling, 28th February
